response.overview: Prot is a patient at a mental hospital who claims to be from a far away planet. His psychiatrist tries to help him, only to begin to doubt his own explanations.
response.tagline: Change the way you look at the world.
response.title: K-PAX

titles.title: K-Pax, l'homme qui vient de loin
K-PAX - L'homme qui vient de loin
K-Pax - Um Homem do Outro Mundo
